translation.en: Santi! Santi!
Santi! Santi! Santi!
Yo, Miami!
On the first leg of his world tour,
translation.es: En la primera etapa de esta gira mundial,

translation.en: make some noise, y'all!
It's Santi!
Absolutely, so heavy.
- Honestly, the heaviest. - I couldn't have done it
translation.es: - El mejor. - No podría haberlo hecho

translation.en: - without my corillo! -
- You're a star. -
- Hey, I gotta call you right back. - Dale, papi.
translation.es: Oye, te llamo en un rato.

translation.en: Santi, we love you so much.
Let's all have sex,
together.
Santi, you can't. It's time.
translation.es: Santi, no puedes. Ya es hora.

translation.en: Time for what?
You ladies can head back with me.
- It's time. Come on. - Ness!
What? We can share!
- We gotta go. We gotta go. Come on. - No.
Come on, Santi, wake up.
- Wake up. -
- Wake up. It's time. - Bro, wake up.
- You don't wanna miss this. - Oh, I had the craziest dream.
translation.es: - No te pierdas esto. - Tuve un sueño muy loco.

translation.en: Tell me everything before we forget.
- Why do you guys do this? - Ness,
I'm this young man's creative director,
and dreams are a creative director's clay, if you will.
translation.es: y los sueños son la arcilla del director creativo, si quieres.

translation.en: - Do you will? - What?
- Do you will? - Okay, Felix,
as this young man's manager, shut the fuck up
translation.es: yo soy su mánager, así que cierra la boca

translation.en: and find a gas station like I've asked you to do.
translation.es: y encuentra una estación de servicio como te pedí.

translation.en: - Yes, sorry. - Guys, we're so blessed.
I mean, we're moving to Miami. Like, this is it.
translation.es: Nos mudamos a Miami. Esto es un hito.

translation.en: Oh, my God, not this again.
I gotta get you there in under an hour,
translation.es: Debemos llegar en menos de una hora

translation.en: to give us enough time to move into the apartment, to eat,
translation.es: para tener tiempo suficiente de mudarnos, comer

translation.en: and get at least eight hours of beauty sleep
translation.es: y tener al menos ocho horas de sueño

translation.en: before the label meeting--
- Shit! - …with his viral hit,
- with over six million views and counting… -
translation.es: con más de seis millones de reproducciones,

translation.en: - …Exagerao, by Fort Myers' own, Santi. -
translation.es: Exagerao, de Santi, de Fort Myers.

translation.en: - Let's go! - Hey, bro, you're on the radio!
- - I'm starstruck.
Guys, this is it. This is destiny!
- Yes! - Yeah!
Yes!
♪ No es el sol, pero quiero que salga Bandida ♪
♪ Tú de mí no te olvidas ♪
It feels so good to finally not be a tourist in Miami.
translation.es: Se siente muy bien no ser turista en Miami por fin.

translation.en: - - Miami.
Oh, this is gonna be great.
- This is gonna be so great! - I--
Yo, we've been here five minutes, already seen your cousin Sebastian's ads.
translation.es: Llegamos hace cinco minutos, y ya vi la publicidad de tu primo. ¿CIRUGÍA DE GLÚTEOS FALLIDA? LLAMA A SEBASTIAN. LOS VEMOS EN EL JUICIO.

translation.en: He must be killing it with all the fucked- up BBLs here.
translation.es: Debe estar arrasando con tanto culo arruinado.

translation.en: A botched BBL wouldn't be a dealbreaker for me.
translation.es: A mí no me molestaría un culo así.

translation.en: It's like getting a discount on bruised fruit.
translation.es: Es como el descuento por la fruta magullada.

translation.en: Still tastes the same.
Don't be bullies, cabrones.
- We're not bullying you. - I can tell by your tone.
translation.es: - No nos burlamos. - Lo noté por el tono.

translation.en: Yo, did… Did Mia's assistant confirm for tomorrow?
translation.es: ¿La asistente de Mia confirmó la cita de mañana?

translation.en: Yeah. We're good. 11:30.
Yes! And she knows that all three of us are coming?
Just 'cause I don't have any experience,
doesn't mean I don't know what I'm doing.
translation.es: no significa que no sepa lo que hago.

translation.en: That's what that means. - - What?
Thinking of the kids suffering in Africa and countries around the world.
translation.es: Pensando en los niños que sufren en África y otros países del mundo.

translation.en: I do this for y'all.
You have alerts on for Javier Luna's Instagram?
translation.es: ¿Tienes alertas del Instagram de Javier Luna?

translation.en: You being jealous of Javier Luna, one of my favorites.
translation.es: Adoro que estés celoso de Javier Luna.

translation.en: Also, his origin story is very fascinating.
translation.es: Además, la historia de sus orígenes es fascinante.

translation.en: I'm not jealous of Javier. I'm just asking why does he have his alerts on?
translation.es: No estoy celoso de Javier. Solo pregunto por qué recibe sus alertas.

translation.en: I don't get why people compare us.
translation.es: No entiendo por qué nos comparan.

translation.en: That guy is like a reggaeton Machine Gun Kelly.
translation.es: El tipo es un Machine Gun Kelly del reggaeton.

translation.en: He doesn't even write his own music.
What's wrong with MGK?
You at least have alerts on for my page, right?
translation.es: También recibes alertas de mi página, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah.
How are you in charge of my social media page
translation.es: ¿Cómo estás a cargo de mis redes sociales

translation.en: but you only have alerts on for Javier Luna and not me?
translation.es: pero solo recibes alertas de Javier y no mías?

translation.en: Why do I need to have alerts on? I post things. I'm the alert.
translation.es: ¿Para qué las quiero? Yo publico las cosas. Soy la alerta.

translation.en: This is why I should be in charge of socials.
translation.es: Por eso, yo debería estar a cargo de las redes.

translation.en: - You in charge of socials? - Yeah.
- Ness, you have two friends. - Yeah, so do you.
translation.es: - Tienes dos amigos. - Sí, y tú también.

translation.en: Who do you want running your Instagram?
Yo, Africa's not even a country.
translation.es: Oigan, África ni siquiera es un país.

translation.en: It isn't, right?
- There it is. This is it. - Ness.
This is not what was in the photos.
translation.es: Ness, no es igual que en las fotos.

translation.en: Relax, I got this.
This is not what was in the photos.
translation.es: No es igual que en las fotos.

translation.en: I know, but the pictures are old, very old.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero las fotos son muy viejas.

translation.en: I had it updated since.
Right.
Did anybody die in here?
I'm definitely feeling someone's ancestors.
translation.es: Siento a los ancestros de alguien.

translation.en: It's not what we thought.
But this place is fine. It comes furnished, I mean…
translation.es: Pero está bien. Está amueblado. Digo…

translation.en: It works.
Given this was a bait and switch,
translation.es: Como no es lo que mostraban,

translation.en: obviously, we're gonna need some sort of discount.
There's gonna be an extra charge for the furniture.
translation.es: Tienen un recargo por los muebles.

translation.en: That's the opposite of what I said.
translation.es: Es lo opuesto de lo que dije.

translation.en: Keep negotiating. You're doing great.
Extra. It has to be extra,
'cause I have to cover the furniture rental, the lease.
translation.es: porque debo cubrir el alquiler de los muebles.

translation.en: I have to pay for the beds, the couch, the table, the spoons.
translation.es: Tengo que pagar las camas, el sofá, la mesa, las cucharas.

translation.en: - Spoons? - Look.
Even with the extra, guys, I mean, this is fine. We're…
translation.es: Incluso con el recargo, está bien. Nosotros…

translation.en: We're in. It's a great deal.
Let's make it happen.
- It's a deal. - Perfect.
Eh, mmm, we'll take care of the paperwork.
It's gonna be two days to process and then you are in.
translation.es: Estarán listos en dos días, y luego pueden entrar.

translation.en: I thought that we were moving in today.
No, no, I didn't say today. I say two- day.
translation.es: No, no dije en el día. Dije en dos días.

translation.en: - No, but we need to be in today. - No.
Can we please find another place?
Not that wouldn't blow our budget.
Okay, is there any way
that we can move in, maybe later this afternoon or maybe tonight?
translation.es: de mudarnos aquí esta tarde o quizá a la noche?

translation.en: Because we don't have anywhere else to go.
No.
I feel like you didn't even think about that. You just said no, real quick.
translation.es: Siento que ni siquiera lo pensó. Dijo que no muy rápido.

translation.en: - No. - That was the same speed.
translation.es: - No. - Igual de rápido que ahora.

translation.en: No. Two days.
Come on, mami?
- Two days. - Two days.
Guys, it's really not that big of a deal.
We can get a motel until the place is ready.
translation.es: Vamos a un motel hasta que esté listo.

translation.en: I mean, that's one option, but also it's kind of not.
translation.es: Es una opción, pero al mismo tiempo, no lo es.

translation.en: Why?
We're already spending way more than I thought on furniture,
translation.es: Ya estamos gastando mucho más de lo que creía en los muebles,

translation.en: and other than the money I set aside for studio time,
translation.es: y aparte del dinero que separé para el estudio,

translation.en: we don't have extra.
We start spending, we start losing.
A motel means we lose, I don't know, a bed.
translation.es: Si vamos a un motel, perdemos, no sé, una cama.

translation.en: Or spoons.
What about Sebastian? I bet his place is sick,
translation.es: ¿Y Sebastian? Seguro que su casa es genial,

translation.en: he's got that botched Brazilian booty bread.
translation.es: tiene toda esa pasta de los traseros.

translation.en: Dude, there's no way that I'm calling Sebby.
That's admitting defeat before we even start.
translation.es: Es admitir la derrota antes de empezar.

translation.en: He wants to help. He even offered you a job.
translation.es: Solo quiere ayudarte. Hasta te ofreció trabajo.

translation.en: If I call him, he's gonna call my dad, and start talking shit,
translation.es: Si lo llamo, llamará a mi papá y empezará a decir mierdas,

translation.en: then my dad will call my tías and tíos
translation.es: y mi papá llamará a mis tías y tíos

translation.en: and say that I should've fucking taken an office job just like them.
translation.es: y dirá que debería haber tomado un trabajo de oficina como ellos.

translation.en: I don't want Sebby to know that I'm here.
translation.es: No quiero que Sebby sepa que estoy aquí.

translation.en: So, what are we gonna do? I vote that we go back home.
translation.es: ¿Y qué haremos? Voto por volver a casa.

translation.en: No.
If we start driving back,
we can make it back in a couple of hours, beat traffic.
translation.es: llegaremos en un par de horas, evitando el tráfico.

translation.en: Big meeting tomorrow. Get some sleep.
translation.es: Mañana tenemos una gran reunión. Duerman.

translation.en: Everybody good?
Yes, perfect. I love this.
Ness, you're tall. Wouldn't you rather be somewhere spacious,
translation.es: Ness, eres alta. ¿No prefieres un lugar más espacioso

translation.en: like the trunk, or the undercarriage?
translation.es: como el baúl o debajo del auto?

translation.en: Ow, what the fuck?
Santi, were you trying to fuck the landlady earlier?
Damn it.
- Come on, park. - We gotta move, we're running late.
translation.es: - Vamos, solo estaciona. - Apúrense, llegamos tarde.

translation.en: All right, hurry up.
Do you really need your fucking backpack?
Guys, we only have ten minutes.
Ness, I can help you with your makeup.
translation.es: Ness, puedo ayudarte con el maquillaje.

translation.en: We're all looking a little tired from last night.
translation.es: Nos vemos un poco cansados por lo de anoche.

translation.en: I did my makeup already.
- Oh, I'm sure it's fine then. - I could kill you.
translation.es: - Entonces, seguro está bien. - Te mataría.

translation.en: So, look, when Mia asks us to sign this record deal,
translation.es: Cuando Mia nos proponga firmar un contrato con la discográfica,

translation.en: do I say yes right away?
Or do I pretend like I'm thinking about it, and then be like,
- Yeah, we'll sign. - Okay, no.
She's not offering us a record deal.
She might not even help us.
We have to prepare for everything.
The only thing I'm preparing for
translation.es: Lo único para lo que estoy listo

translation.en: is filling our oceanfront balcony with hoes.
translation.es: es para llenar de perras el balcón sobre el mar.

translation.en: Sorry, shouldn't have said that.
I'm trying new things. It's Miami.
translation.es: Estoy probando cosas nuevas. Es Miami.

translation.en: Don't expect her to offer us anything.
translation.es: No esperen que nos ofrezca algo.

translation.en: If she did, that would be great. But we have a plan.
translation.es: Si lo hace, genial. Pero tenemos un plan.

translation.en: So remember the plan. We have this meeting,
we parlay that into other meetings,
then we network with DJ and industry types,
translation.es: hacemos contactos con DJ y gente de la industria.

translation.en: spend a little money to promote on some playlists
translation.es: Promocionamos unos temas con algo de dinero

translation.en: once we figure out who's who,
translation.es: y cuando sepamos quién es quién,

translation.en: build the hype, you record new music,
and then we start a bidding war between the record labels.
translation.es: Luego, las discográficas se pelearán por nosotros.

translation.en: Trust the plan.
So, trust the plan that has us
preparing for the meeting of our lives in a gas station bathroom?
translation.es: a prepararnos para la gran reunión en un baño público?

translation.en: That is what I am here for. Music, plans.
translation.es: Para eso estoy aquí. Música, planes.

translation.en: It's not coming to mind
- what you're here for. - I'm the creative director.
translation.es: - para qué estás tú. - Soy el director creativo.

translation.en: - The fuck? - I don't really--
Stop it. We trust the plan, okay?
- That's why you're the captain. - Ya tú sabe.
No.
Is this sensor or is it a switch?
- Wait, wee bit higher. Up there. - No, hit it!
Don't hit it! Don't hit it!
Santi?
Ah, it's so good to finally meet you.
- It's a pleasure. -
- And you must be Ness. - Yes.
translation.es: - Y tú debes ser Ness. - Sí.

translation.en: - Nice to meet you. - You, too.
You must be Felix. I love how you directed the video.
translation.es: Debes ser Felix. Me encantó el video.

translation.en: - It's a pleasure to finally connect. - Okay.
translation.es: - Es un placer conectar por fin. - Bien.

translation.en: We can't believe that we're meeting with someone from the biggest
translation.es: No podemos creer estar con alguien de la discográfica más grande

translation.en: - reggaeton label in the game. - Please.
Okay.
- Come on, let's go find our table. - Okay.
Calm down.
Okay, man, look, I just gotta say,
I am impressed with how you do it all.
translation.es: cuánto me impresiona que hagas todo.

translation.en: I mean, you… You write, you produce, you perform.
You know how rare that is in this space?
You have a real ear for it.
Oh, and the video?
Loved how y'all did the video.
translation.es: Me encantó lo que hicieron ahí.

translation.en: - It was just-- - Thank you.
Of course.
Six million views is no joke.
I just love when people just go out there
translation.es: Me encanta cuando la gente sale

translation.en: and figure shit out.
That's what you're supposed to do.
translation.es: Es lo que se debe hacer.

translation.en: So, now, I have to ask, where do you see yourself going from here?
translation.es: Debo preguntar: ¿dónde te ves a partir de aquí?

translation.en: I mean, well, this might sound kind of crazy to you, but I feel like
translation.es: Puede sonar un poco loco, pero siento

translation.en: I can be the biggest reggaeton star in the world.
translation.es: que puedo ser la estrella más grande del reggaeton.

translation.en: Yeah, that doesn't sound crazy at all.
translation.es: Sí, no me suena para nada loco.

translation.en: If you could call my parents and tell them,
translation.es: Si pudieras decírselo a mis padres,

translation.en: that would be great.
Yeah, I'll do it after I call mine.
translation.es: Los llamaré tras llamar a los míos.

translation.en: I'll do it right after I call mine.
You wanna be the biggest reggaeton star in the world.
translation.es: Quieres ser la estrella más grande del reggaeton.

translation.en: What's the next move?
Please tell me it's not that you moved here,
translation.es: Por favor, no digas que te mudas aquí,

translation.en: take a few meetings with some labels
and were hoping they'd climb over each other to…  …sign you.
translation.es: y esperas que se peleen por firmar contrato contigo.

translation.en: - No. - No.
Okay, good.
Of course not, no, um…
We have a really well- thought- out plan, and it's, uh, like, multifaceted.
translation.es: Tenemos un plan muy bien pensado. Es polifacético.

translation.en: I could explain it to you. It's just like--
- Eh, I got you. - Yeah.
It sounds intricate. I love that,
because not everybody has it figured out.
translation.es: porque no todos lo tienen resuelto.

translation.en: See that guy there?
The waiter?
He's a musician, too.
He's really good.
We had a meeting here a couple months ago at this exact same table.
translation.es: Tuvimos una reunión hace un par de meses en esta misma mesa.

translation.en: But it didn't work out the way he wanted it to.
translation.es: Pero no salió como él quería.

translation.en: So now, he's here bringing people sandwiches.
translation.es: Así que ahora sirve sándwiches a la gente.

translation.en: So you specifically picked this restaurant
just to, like, point out that guy's failures?
translation.es: para señalar los fracasos de ese tipo?

translation.en: No. What I'm trying to tell you is, that's every restaurant here.
translation.es: No. Lo que intento decir es que pasa en todos los restaurantes.

translation.en: That's the point.
I can't say this without sounding just a little bit slimy,
translation.es: No puedo decir esto sin sonar un poco grosera,

translation.en: but the music industry is tough.
There's so many things new artists don't even know they don't even know.
translation.es: Hay mucho que los artistas nuevos ni siquiera saben que no saben.

translation.en: Market reports,
securing guest features and producers,
media promotions, tour scheduling. It's…
translation.es: promociones en los medios, giras. Es…

translation.en: I say that to say we have people to do all that shit for you.
translation.es: Es decir, hay gente que hace todo eso por ti.

translation.en: All you worry about is make some good music.
translation.es: Y tú solo haces buena música.

translation.en: Great, that's what I do.
Plus, there's upfront money, too.
Yeah.
Yeah, there are a lot of uncertainties with being an independent artist.
translation.es: Sí, hay muchas incertidumbres al ser un artista independiente.

translation.en: But with being an independent artist, what you do know, uh,
translation.es: Pero como artista independiente, lo que sí sabes

translation.en: is nothing happens without your say- so.
translation.es: es que no pasa nada sin tu aprobación.

translation.en: And I mean, yeah, that is a hell of a lot more work,
translation.es: Y sí, es mucho más trabajo,

translation.en: but I don't see that as a bad thing.
translation.es: pero no me parece algo malo.

translation.en: Why would working harder be a bad thing, you know?
translation.es: ¿Por qué trabajar duro sería algo malo?

translation.en: Also, that is nothing to say of how whatever money you make
translation.es: Además, no está de más decir que todo lo que ganas

translation.en: goes directly to you.
Can't argue with that.
Oh, shit.
I'm so sorry,
Um, I actually have to go.
- Wait.  - Shit.
You're leaving? Right now?
Yeah, I'm sorry.
My, uh, label is throwing this huge beach club event tonight
translation.es: Mi discográfica hará un gran evento en la playa hoy

translation.en: and I have to call all the artists.
translation.es: y debo llamar a los artistas.

translation.en: Sounds fun.
Yes, it will be. Thank you guys so much for lunch. This was great.
translation.es: Sí, lo será. Muchas gracias por el almuerzo. Fue genial.

translation.en: Yes, hi. Uh- huh.
You cannot bring him.
She didn't offer us a deal. Didn't invite us to the party.
translation.es: No nos ofreció un contrato. No nos invitó a la fiesta.

translation.en: Didn't even offer to pay for lunch.
Don't do that.
All I'm saying is it feels a lot like
Mia showed up feeling one way about us
translation.es: que Mia llegó pensando una cosa,

translation.en: and then you started spraying your Ness mist everywhere,
translation.es: y luego tú empezaste a tirar toda tu mierda,

translation.en: then she left feeling a different way.
translation.es: y ella se fue en otra dirección.

translation.en: Who tells someone about a party, but doesn't invite them to it?
translation.es: ¿Quién le cuenta a alguien de una fiesta sin invitarlo?

translation.en: Someone trying to send us a message.
translation.es: Alguien que quiere dar un mensaje.

translation.en: Someone covered
- in Ness mist. - Stop saying that.
translation.es: - en la mierda de Ness. - Basta.

translation.en: - It's gross. - For real,
what was going on back there? You started to go off script.
translation.es: ¿qué pasó ahí? Te saliste del guion.

translation.en: I'm the manager, right?
I have to make sure that we make smart decisions.
translation.es: Debo asegurarme de tomar decisiones listas.

translation.en: It didn't all the way feel like that.
It felt like there was some subtext that Mia for sure noticed.
translation.es: Parecía haber un subtexto que Mia con seguridad notó.

translation.en: So you thought we had a good plan before, but now you don't?
translation.es: ¿Antes te parecía un buen plan, pero ahora no?

translation.en: Diablo, it took one lunch meeting for you to trust somebody more than us.
translation.es: Solo bastó una reunión para que confiaras más en otro.

translation.en: I did not mean it like that. I'm just saying that
translation.es: No quise decir eso. Solo digo

translation.en: Mia, she started to say that our whole plan out here is shitty.
translation.es: que Mia empezó a decir que nuestro plan era una mierda.

translation.en: - That didn't set off bells in your head? - That's literally
translation.es: - ¿No te hizo sonar ninguna alarma? - Es así.

translation.en: what they do, it's a power game. She wants us to think we need her.
translation.es: Es un juego de poder. Quiere que pensemos que la necesitamos.

translation.en: If I wasn't in this group, I would think it's hilarious
translation.es: Si no estuviera en este grupo, me parecería gracioso

translation.en: how fucked we are. It took us one lunch meeting
translation.es: lo jodidos que estamos. Con solo una reunión,

translation.en: for Ness to lose us our multimillion dollar record deal.
translation.es: Ness nos hizo perder un contrato multimillonario.

translation.en: There was no deal!
There was a deal. And you fucked it!
You know what? Fuck it.
We gotta go to this party.
- The one Mia didn't invite us to? - Yeah.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? ¿A la que no nos invitaron? - Sí.

translation.en: We show her we're not some fucking loser wannabes.
translation.es: Le mostraremos que no somos unos perdedores.

translation.en: Ness, the three of us currently live in a 2009 Toyota Corolla.
translation.es: Ness, estamos viviendo en un Toyota Corolla de 2009.

translation.en: Mmm- hmm. I'm gonna find that party and go there,
and I'm going to get Exagerao played there.
It won't be listed online.
It's an industry event, not a college job fair.
translation.es: Es algo de la industria, no una feria de empleo.

translation.en: - Found it. - Oh.
How did you find that?
Went to the label's site, found an employee registry,
translation.es: En su sitio, vi la lista de empleados.

translation.en: went to Instagram, looked for pictures, names.
translation.es: En Instagram, busqué fotos y nombres.

translation.en: Then I checked if anyone had posted it,
translation.es: Luego me fijé si habían publicado algo,

translation.en: 'cause everybody posts everything.
Wait.
Doesn't make sense.
It'll feel weird to show up there uninvited, like--
No, it's a straight- up bad idea.
At best, Mia is on the fence about a deal.
translation.es: Como mucho, Mia está indecisa con el contrato.

translation.en: If we show up to a party we're not even supposed to know about,
translation.es: Si vamos a una fiesta de la que no deberíamos saber,

translation.en: she'll think we're stalking her.
- It'll ruin our chance. - No. We should go.
Picture it. We are at the beach. Industry big shots
translation.es: Imagínalo. En la playa. Los peces gordos

translation.en: - are listening to your song-- - Yes.
Yes, easy for you to say 'cause it's not your song.
translation.es: Es fácil decirlo porque no es tu canción.

translation.en: What if it doesn't go well? Then I'm a joke.
translation.es: ¿Y si no sale bien? Seré un chiste.

translation.en: But you won't be.
Because you are gonna show them what I've known since I was 12 years old.
translation.es: Porque les demostrarás lo que yo sé desde los 12 años.

translation.en: And that is that you are a star.
translation.es: Y es que eres una estrella.

translation.en: This is the moment that we moved to Miami for.
translation.es: Para este momento vinimos a Miami.

translation.en: We're supposed to be there.
Hey.
Going to this party?
It's our destiny.
- Yeah! - Now you're talking.
- Time to work your charm. - I got this.
translation.es: - Hora de usar tu encanto. - Bien.

translation.en: You got this. You're a big, strong man.
translation.es: Tú puedes. Eres un hombre fuerte.

translation.en: Listen, you probably get this every night, but it's just like,
translation.es: Hola, seguro te lo dicen cada noche, pero solo

translation.en: literally just me and my beautiful friends--
translation.es: somos yo y mis hermosos amigos…

translation.en: Santi? Love your video, man.
Come right in.
Wait. Stop right there.
We just gotta not be too conspicuous and blend in.
translation.es: No seamos muy conspicuos e integrémonos.

translation.en: Holy fuck. Is that Jon Z?
Oh, shit.
And is that Brray?
Nah. Everyone is at this party. I gotta go talk to them, Ness.
translation.es: No. Todos están aquí. Debo hablar con ellos, Ness.

translation.en: What? No, that's the opposite of what I said.
translation.es: ¿Qué? No, es lo opuesto de lo que dije.

translation.en: - It's my destiny! - No.
I don't think he knows what conspicuous means.
translation.es: Creo que no sabe qué significa 'conspicuo'.

translation.en: Santi?
Mia.
- How did you-- - What's up? We figured it out.
- You did. - You said earlier
you're most interested in people who figure things out.
translation.es: que te interesaban los que resuelven las cosas.

translation.en: So Ness, she figured some stuff out and here we are.
translation.es: Así que Ness resolvió algunas cosas y aquí estamos.

translation.en: - Here you are. - Here we are.
What's new with you?
- Nothing since today. - Good.
I wanna introduce to you the next big thing in reggaeton.
translation.es: Quiero presentar a la próxima estrella del reggaeton.

translation.en: My friend, mi hermano, con ustedes, Javier Luna!
We signed Javier Luna couple of months ago.
translation.es: Contratamos a Javier Luna hace un par de meses.

translation.en: He's great, right?
I never heard of him.
You know, that could be you up there.
All right, guys, have fun.
I'm gonna go out and mingle.
You guys are really here.
What kind of look was that?
Was that like, I respect your hustle look
translation.es: ¿Fue una mirada de respeto su timo

translation.en: or was that, you super overstepped look?
translation.es: o de se pasaron de la raya?

translation.en: That was good. That was a good look.
No, it was bad.
I'm gonna get a drink.
Yo.
I need to know something.
You started pushing being independent at the meeting,
translation.es: Empezaste a insistir con ser independientes

translation.en: sort of out of nowhere, and honestly, I look around at this party
translation.es: de la nada, y sinceramente, miro alrededor en esta fiesta

translation.en: and it doesn't seem that terrible.
translation.es: y no me parece tan terrible.

translation.en: Signing a deal with Mia, if it's a good one,
translation.es: Firmar un contrato con Mia, si es bueno,

translation.en: is the best thing.
- Right. - And I hope that
she does offer it.
And I hope that we didn't actually fuck it up today. I just…
translation.es: Y espero que no la hayamos jodido hoy. Solo…

translation.en: You clearly vibed with her.
Right? And professionally,
she is the better version of what I'm supposed to be,
translation.es: es la mejor versión de lo que yo debería ser.

translation.en: and I don't know, I bet everything on this too,
translation.es: Y yo también aposté todo a esto.

translation.en: and I just kept seeing this thing in my head of me getting pushed out.
translation.es: Pero no paro de imaginar que me dejan de lado.

translation.en: Of course, I think she's cool and she knows her shit,
translation.es: Sí, creo que ella es genial y sabe lo que hace,

translation.en: but, like, you're like my fucking sister, bro.
translation.es: pero tú eres como mi hermana.

translation.en: I'm still at home working for my parents if it's not for you.
translation.es: Seguiría en casa trabajando para mis padres si no fuera por ti.

translation.en: You see things that I don't,
in people, in situations, in myself.
translation.es: en la gente, en las situaciones, en mí.

translation.en: So, I mean, what are you seeing right now?
Dímelo, ¿qué tú quieres hacer? You wanna go?
What are you feeling?
I guess I'm feeling like, I mean, it is a party,
and we are in Miami.
And there are a lot of cuties here we can talk to.
translation.es: Y hay mucha gente linda con la que hablar.

translation.en: Throw on your Ness swag
and go bag yourself a cutie, okay?
- You want me to wingman you? - No, I do not.
Uh, Mr. Z y Mr. Brray.
I mean, I don't even know what to call you.
Papi, just call me Bambi, Bambini,
Bamburrio, Bamvicio, el alma de la fiesta, or Brray, bro.
translation.es: Bamburrio, Bamvicio, el alma de la fiesta o Bryan.

translation.en: A'ight, I'mma just stick with Brray.
Yo, listen, I just wanna say that, like,
I'm a huge fan of your work
translation.es: que soy un gran fan de su trabajo

translation.en: and I think that you guys are just incredible, man.
Where do I know you from, bro?
I'm a reggaeton artist. My name is Santi.
translation.es: Soy artista de reggaeton. Me llamo Santi.

translation.en: Oh, yeah… El video ese de Exagerao.
- Exagerao. - That's a banger, bro.
- You got real talent. - Thank you, bro. You, too.
translation.es: - Tienes mucho talento. - Gracias. Tú también.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
It's destiny!
Yo! It's his song! It's his song!
We're getting a record deal, baby!
What's up?
It was a good look, guys.
Oscar Morales's office.
No, this is his assistant, Mia.
Okay, I'll pass that message along. Okay, bye.
translation.es: Bien, le pasaré el mensaje. Adiós.

translation.en: Mia, my coffee, please! And where's my dry- cleaning?
translation.es: Mia, ¡mi café! ¿Y la ropa de la tintorería?

translation.en: It just got here.
